attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2002-1914

Date: 2002-11-19

Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Transport, pursuant to subsection 3(1) of An Act respecting the Buffalo and Fort Erie Public Bridge Company, hereby reappoints the following persons to be members of the Buffalo and Fort Erie Public Bridge Authority to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, effective

November 26, 2002:



Peter J. Caperchione

Port Colborne, Ontario



Deanna DiMartile

Fort Erie, Ontario





Sur recommandation du ministre des Transports et en vertu du paragraphe 3(1) de la Loi concernant la � Buffalo and Fort Erie Public Bridge Company �, Son Excellence la Gouverneure générale en conseil nomme de nouveau les personnes suivantes, membres de la � Buffalo and Fort Erie Public Bridge Authority �, à titre amovible, pour un mandat de trois ans, à compter du

26 novembre 2002 :



Peter J. Caperchione

Port Colborne (Ontario)



Deanna DiMartile

Fort Erie (Ontario)
